channel.title: HOWTO on Greg. I/O
channel.description: Recent content in HOWTO on Greg. I/O

item.title: Setup a Hotspot Wifi with Ansible into a RaspberryPi 3
item.description: This September, RaspberryPi foundation has sold ten (10) Millions of unit. This small computer is amazing, you can setup very quickly several cool IoT projects. Since 2012, I bought all versions (B 256Mo, B 512Mo, B+, 2B, 3B) of RaspberryPi. I am a big fan of this product and you can find into this blog some projects I’ve made on top of this little computer. RaspberryPi version 3 comes with a wifi builtin interface, and this wifi interface can be configured as a Wifi Hotspot.
